Blog.post: and i thought life was getting boring.....boyy was i wrong.....soooo much drama going around......drama...drama....drama.......

OMG.........rumi's getting married on the 4th of July :O.....i know she went to get married and all, but still its such a huge shock....she's getting married b4 runa is (runa's isnt settled it, im guessing there are still issues that need to be solved...rumi said runa might end up marrying someone she knows from the states :O...its not that big of a shock though, i had my ideas about that even b4 she left...i just hope all goes well and she gets to marry who she wants, i mean afterall isnt marriage suppose to be about happiness and bonding and eternal luv)...i guess rumi wants to keep the family tradition still on (her mom got married b4 altaf's mom, and altaf's mom is older than her) so anywayz...back to rumi...so yeah she's getting married on the 4th of July (so is shammi afa)...rumi's making me seem soo old and outdated and off the market..lol...she's gonna be the first one to make me a zetali (i think thats how u spell it)...im gonna be an unmarried zetali, and rumi's hubby has to bend down and do salam to me and im gonna have to pay him....damn...im still in shock though.....i cant even still digest tahera's and happy's weddings...and they're at least at of age, now rumi!!!!...omg.... so i called bd last night and talked to tahera and her hubby....her hubby is maaaaad funny...cant wait till he comes to the states..mo...we're gonna have maad fun....oh btw mo, tahera keeps asking y u havent called yet..she said she left u a message too on ur phone, so i told her ur gonna call......so call :) ....azir bhai is a piece of work...he left me speechless last night...he told me he used up our gift in just one week :)...i just hope he goes out and gets some more of those, cuz i dont want tahera to come back with anyone else :) anywayz...my breaks going on overtime now...lol...i was supposed to go back to work at 10:20 its almost 10:30...Dan's not here, so im taking advantage of that fact :)...gotta go back to work now and deal with the old wierdo, who is btw STILL not talking to me...he's sooo childish ...i mean ur freakin 60 something yrs old...grow up and stop acting like a child....

Bole woh dosti, chupp karaye woh pyaar. Hasaye woh dosti, rulaye woh pyaar. Milaye woh dosti, juda kare woh pyaar. Phir bhi na jaane log DOSTI chodd ke kyun karte hain PYAAR ....quite interesting quote

and i thought nothing could change my mood after monday...boy was i wrong.....all u need is an overly-annoying dad, a mom who keeps decreasing ur height in order to find a "good zamai", and the other wonderful stresses of finding the right jivan sathi... i dont understand this whole concept of marriage...am i not the person getting married or should get married???....y is it that i have to mend to other's aspirations and ideas of me meeting the ideal man??? anywayz...madiha just called.....so im gonna have to bitch later
Mere Dil Ko Yeh Kya Hogaya Main Na Janu Kahan Kho Gaya Kyon Lage Din Mein Bhi Raat Hai Dhoop Mein Jaise Barsaat Hai Aisa Kyon Hota Hai Baar Baar Kya Isko Hi Kehte Hai Pyaar???

Aankhon Aankhon Se Koi Teer Chalta Rehta Hai Is Kadar Saawan Mein Bhi Jism Jalta Rehta Hai Pyaas Jitni Rooko Main Utni Badhti Jaati Hai Dooriyon Ki Bechaini Mujhko Uh Tadpati Hai Shaamo Sehar Bezaar Kare Jeena Dushwaar Kare Hai Jo Bhi Yaha Pyaar Kare Jeena Dushwaar Kare Hai Kitna Pagal Dil Hai Kaise Yeh Mushkil Hai Bewaja Kisi Pe Aitbaar Kare Jo Bhi Yahan Pyaar Kare Jeena Dushwaar Kare Hai

The sweetest thing I've ever known Was like the kiss on the collarbone Soft caress of happiness The way you walk, your style of dress I wish I didn't get so weak Ooo, baby, just to hear you speak Makes me argue just to see How much you're in love with me See, like a queen, a queen upon her throne It was the sweet, sweet, sweetest thing I know, It was the sweet, sweet, sweetest thing I know I get mad when you walk away (don't walk away) So I tell you leave, when I mean stay Warm as the sun dipped in black Fingertips on the small of my back More valuable than all I own Like your precious, precious, precious, precious light skin tone It was the sweet, sweet, sweetest thing I know, It was the sweet, sweet, sweetest thing I know "Sweetest Thing" Lauryn Hill
:) :) :).....will explain later...dont have enough time to write :)
muskurakar mila karo hamse, kuch kaha, kuch suna karo hamse, baat karne se hi baat badhti hai, janaab roz baat kiya karo hamse.....
aansoon ko aankhon ki dehleez par laya na karo...... apne dil ki haalat kisi ko bataaya na karo....... apne zakham kisi ko dikhaaya na karo.

Hai Khuda Hafiz Shukriya Meharbani Pal Do Pal Kya Mile Mil Gayi Pareshaani Anjana Anjaani Begaana Begaana Begaani Ghoomte Phirte Milte Hai Milte Hai Milke Saath Wo Chalte Hai Chalte Hai Dostana Naya Naya Naya Rahein Wahi Puraani Kal Miley Na Miley Sochna Hai Kya Shor Mein Abhi Kuch Bolna Hai Kya Ye Jo Pal Hain Wo Apne Hain Ruk Ja Zara O Deeewane

'tis the season to be married.......seems like everyone and anyone i know decided to get married this summer....shaki afa's and bina's already has been done with and now all the exciting ones still await....still in shock about tahera's and happy's wedding falling on the exact same day...i mean wow...... who couldve ever imagined..the same EXACT DATE..june 20th...thats gonna stay with them for the rest of their lives.....although technically, tahera's gonna be the first one to get married, b/c she's over there in bd and thats ahead from here....so azir bhai has a head start b4 the newly mr. rumman gets his chance at our dear happy....i think since they're getting married on the same date, they should do everything together too....they should time everything accordingly...tahera should call happy and find out when she's ready to let it loose (of course i mean suhag raat here ....oh my gosh i could here tahera singing "suhag raat hai, ghoongat kulrahi hu mein" to azir bhai...and azir bhai all getting excited......man i wish i was there, i wish they tape it), so that she could do the same in the nice blue outfit we bought her :) (we still gotta buy happy's...dotn worry happy, its just hard to find one that also comes with a matching hijab) so with them getting married on the 20th that leaves..me, mo, and adina to go find someone in two weeks so we could all get married on the same day...that would be soo cool....i dotn know about adina, but if me and mo really wanted that to happen mo has alshan bhaiya and i have goosebumps...the only reason tahera and happy found their mate really was b/c they didnt have to go that far....they just had to go to thier aunt's/uncle's house...me and mo could do the same thing :) this upcoming sat is my long awaited graduation party.....lal mama's crazy ass is beasting to throw me one, so i had no choice but to accept it......im kinda excited about it, cuz i got to get material (a gift from mo) and have an outfit made out of it...cant wait to c that, im gonna pick that up tom :).. ma made me call some of my relatives and invite them to the party, i hate talkign to ppl that i dont usually have to talk to, so that was pretty awkard.....i called kuku's house praying goosebumps wasnt there, telling her to tell him that he's invited.....but with my luck he was home and she gave the phone to him......ewwwwwwwwwww....i had to talk to him.....i told him that "lal mama's throwing a graduation party for me and told me to invite all my cuzins...and since ur my cuzin..ur invited".....lol.....i think i came out mean..i tried not too....but then again its me, so even without noticing it i prolly did sound it...but its all good :) so back to the party..the sucky part of the whole deal is that its all the way in long island.....none of my friends really can make it there....im still praying on sasa letting mo go there though.....i mean how can i have a party without her :(.....thatll be really sad :('... thats that with the party......work is going pretty well......foudn out today that it was steve's and dan's bday ....theyr'e born on the same date, different yrs....steve's alot older than dan, although dan looks older...but old men are old men....so it doesnt matter whose older looking.. speaking of old men.......i thought only old women go through mood swings..but now that i have the pleasure of workign with a few...i found out that they go through worse ones...this one dude named walter goes through the worse of them all.....one day he's laughing and jokign with me adn the next he's ignoring me as if i did soemthing to him...its sooo damn annoying....im like gosh....wat the hell is wrong with u anywayz......i think my time at the computer is up now...my beast of a dad is comign to claim his property....im gonna go now.....this has been my very first detailed blog...im gonna try to do this more often, but knowing how lazy i am...that's gonna be hard :)
the sun must have risen on the opposite side this morning........someone actually decided to call :o

Jism marneh se insaan marta nehi bas badal jata hai vow bahut yaad mein zinda ho jata hai, khudba khud har gari uskeh har zikr mein...uski har bhat mein...... hum bulakar useh, bulsakteh nehi.... isleeyeh buljaneh ki parva nehi happy 19th birthday shim...........missing u more than anything and needing u more than ever :' :'

Deeevanoin Sa Haal Hua Hum Ko To Unnse Pyaar Hua Dheere Se Vo Paas Aaaye Chuppkee Se Izhaar Hua Tum Dil Kiiii Dhadkan Mein Rehte Hooo, Rehte Hooo Meri Inn Saansoin Se Kehte Hooo, Kehte Hooo Baaahoin Mein Aaaja O Sapnoin Mein Khoo Jaa O Tum Dil Kiiii Dhadkan Mein Rehte Hooo, Rehte Hooo

i wanted to write mo a comment on her blog, cuz she held me at gun point and asked me too.......i had no idea i had to start my own blog in order to make a comment...i dont like talking about myself...im more of a commentator....i like reading material from others and then putting my two cents in it (yeah i only have 2 of them :) )...

stress.......stress..........and more stress fobs...........fobs........and more fobs if i c another bio-data of some nasty looking dude, i swear im gonna go postal (as michelle always says).......y cant ppl just let me be and let me breathe...its all i ask someone plzzzz come and kidnap me.......im willing to pay u (and no....not the way mo pays.......a quarter for something in return......) i just want to be kidnapped thats all :/
On a Monday, I am waiting Tuesday, I am fading

shumi sent me a forward with some pretty interesting quotes that almost describes the way i feel..... "The worst way to miss someone is to be sitting right beside them knowing you can't have them." "Don't cry because it is over, smile because it happened." (this quote will come in handy soon enough :/ )
y did allah make fathers soooo wierd and annoying???..... waiting for that unfortunate dude to come and marry me away from this crazy drama house......
Tum se doori ka ahsas jab sataane laga........ tere saat guzara har lamha yaad aane laga..... jab bhi tumko bhulane ki koshish ki..... aye dost..... tu dil ke aur paas aane laga... :/

wat i did on my day off: sat in front of the tv for a non-stop 4 hrs of flipping through channels....munching on chips and soda and ice cream :)....i feel like a pig now.....i think i just gained all the pounds that im trying to loose for the last couple of weeks....boy do i hate days off when there's nothing to do....im sooo bored now...im tired of the tv....i have no clue wat to do next, so im gonna sit here and listen to music and surf the web... aint my life soooo excitin??...:)
cant take the heat no more....wayyyy tooo hot
rumi got married last night.......shammi afa's getting ready for her wedding right now....and i couldnt go to anyone one of them :(' :(' :('

Seene Ki Aag Hoton Ke Pass Bhadki Hui Hai Kabse Ab Kya Sochna Haan Bhool Jane De Gum Sum Hai Baat Jab Tu Ho Saath Chaayi Hai Bekhayali Hum Dum Jo Bhi Woh Ho Jane De Bekhabar Nazar Ho Gaya Asar Tere Nazre Inkar Ko Subha Sham Aur Sehar Ka Khula Zehar Jeena Tha Bezaar Yeha Karle Har Sitam Tu Karle Bah Mein Mujhe Tu Bharle Behke Hai Kadam Teri Kasam Yeh Reshmin Palke Haseen Bahon Ke Narm Badal Sach Hai Kya Pata Ya Koi Khwab Hai Yeh Asmaan Aur Yeh Zameen Sab Kaynat Teri Hai Sab Se Juda Tu La Jawab Hai Bekhabar Nazar Ho Gaya Asar Tere Nazre Inkar Ko Subha Sham Aur Sehar Ka Khula Zehar Jeena Tha Bezaar Yeha Karle Har Sitam Tu Karle Bah Mein Mujhe Tu Bharle Behke Hai Kadam Teri Kasam

i wish i had the power to freeze time...........i wouldve kept myself in yesterday forever :) .....but sadly im not granted such powers nor am i granted my own future, so i just have to live the moment and keep all the sweetest memories inside my head and wait and c wat tommorrow brings :/ ......
